title: The Funky Tales of Oooka Chewobie
description: STOP!!!Put this book down if you value your sanity! If not, then feel free to step into the world of Oooka Chewobie - where nothing is as it seems, yet everything is as it seems! A series of short stories filled with parodied actors, extraordinary characters, and colorful creatures such as the Skunkulator, and don't be surprised if you feel the urge to try the new dance craze: The Poumbaloom! This is your final warning, if you didn't need a therapist before, you will by the time you get done reading The Funky Tales of Oooka Chewobie!
author: Megan Wilson
